text: Hifikepunye Lucas Pohamba (born 18 August 1935https://rulers.org/indexp3.html)Profile of Pohamba, Klausdierks.com.National Assembly profile for Pohamba . is a Namibian politician. He was the second President of Namibia from 21 March 2005 to 21 March 2015. Pohamba was the President of SWAPO from 2007 until his retirement in 2015. Pohamba is a recipient of the Ibrahim Prize. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Namibia
title: Hifikepunye Pohamba
